name: Math Block - Color Merge Dream
description:
This is a simple but challenging and fun puzzler for all the brain training game lovers. It sure looks easy at first but it gets harder and harder as you progress.

How to play?

The goal of the game is to connect 4 or more cells with the same number to create a bigger number. After each move, you will be challenged with more random numbers that will appear as you progress that will increasing the difficulty of game.

Get it now for free and start training to become the puzzle master. Have a lot of fun while playing. Enjoy!
